text: trong ban mean bantoul tha yeung nung pongrung kechchakar robsa anak daoy bangobrosa robsa anak haey yeung nung bratan amnach dl anak teangpir . haey puokke min ach thveutoukkhatosa dl anak teangpir ban laey . daoysaar phosdo tang robsa yeung anak teangpir ning anak del ban tam anak teangpir kuchea anak del mean chychomneah
